heading: HB07562
0: AN ACT DECLARING THE DAO TREE WHICH  CAN BE FOUND WITHIN A  POCKET SECONDARY FOREST IN THE INTEGRATED FOREST MANAGEMENT AGREEMENT (IFMA) AREA OF THE E. PELAEZ RANCH IN BAYOMBONG, BARANGAY  CUGMAN, CAGAYAN DE ORO CITY AS THE HERITAGE TREE OF THE CITY AND FURTHER DECLARING IT A TOURIST SPOT
